This website www.exademy.in is operated by Exademy Education (About us). Throughout the site, the terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to Exademy Education. Exademy Education offers this website, including all information, tools and services available from this site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.
By visiting our site and/ or purchasing something from us, you engage in our “Service” and agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions (“Terms of Service”, “Terms”), including those additional terms and conditions and policies referenced herein and/or available by hyperlink. We have customised pricing according to the different courses and study material provided by us. The details are provided to you beforehand according to the effort, efficiency and the output of the service. Typically the range of transactions on our website varies from INR 30 to INR 1000 (Maybe more or less Depending on Situation).
Schedule of payment
The duration of any particular is not fixed it varies from time to time depending on the demand of students.
Repeating Online Classroom courses
You are entitled to attend classes only with the batch that you have enrolled for at the time of signing up for the course. If for some reason, you could not complete the course with the batch or you would like to repeat either a part of the course or the entire course, you will have to pay a readmission fee, as per the prevalent readmission terms.

We follow a strict No Refund policy. To help you make an informed decision, all our online courses allow you to try a part of the course (usually about 10% of the course) before you enrol for the course.

The copyright in the User Content on Exademy Platform are owned by publishers, where Exademy is a limited license holder to publish the same on Exademy Platform. The User Content is subject to the various Terms and Conditions and other policies (together “Terms”) as provided on the Exademy Platform, kindly ensure that you use the User Content only within the parameters as provided in the Terms. You are prohibited from using the User Content as your own without the prior permission of the content creator and Exademy.
Exademy Content on the Exademy Platform including but not limited to, images, graphics, process, images, software, graphics, are owned by or licensed to Exademy and subject to Copyright and you are prohibited from using the same as your own, without the prior permission of Exademy. For clarity, Exademy Content does not include User Content.
If you believe that any Publisher/User has used copyright-protected work in the User Content posted on the Exademy Platform, an option to report the User Content is provided and you can report the same by using the report button or if you believe your or someone else’s copyrights are being infringed upon through the Exademy Platform, then let us know by writing to us at team.exademy@gmail.com
Please note that by claiming copyright infringement you are initiating a legal process, kindly be sure to consider whether fair use, fair dealing, or a similar exception to copyright apply before you report.

The trademarks, service marks, logos displayed on the Exademy Platform are owned by Exademy (“Exademy Marks”). If you haven’t received our permission, do not use the Exademy Marks as your own or in any manner that implies sponsorship or endorsement or any relation to Exademy.
A product or service branded with the Exademy name or logo is a reflection of Exademy. Unless you are one of our licensees, we don’t allow others to make, sell, or give away anything with our name or logo on it.

When users violate Exademy terms of service, the company can remove your account for any reason without giving you prior notice. What is Plus subscription?
Plus Subscription gives you access to all live courses and quizzes launched every month within the goal you have subscribed for. Plus subscription is available for one month, six year and a year.
